metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7651 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Eclipse Mosquitto 1.4.14, a user can shutdown the Mosquitto serversimply by filling the RAM memory with a lot of connections with largepayload. This can be done without authentications if occur in connectionphase of MQTT protocol.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7651` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmosquitto1 - 1.4.15-1
libmosquittopp1 - 1.4.15-1
mosquitto - 1.4.15-1
mosquitto-clients - 1.4.15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.15-1').
